name: Dice-munition
description:
This game was made for the GMTK game jam, but unfortunately a weird bug prevented submission. Here it is, anyway, outside of the jam! Created by Per and Rasmus.

In this game you are a spaceship which shoots aliens. The twist is that you upgrade your systems using dice.

  • Art mainly by ShMEL Studio - Space Set
  • Music cut from music by Muz Station Productions - Mega Game Music Collection
